articles.title: Lucy Mecklenburgh tries not to cry as she explains son's diagnosis after hospital dash - The Mirror
articles.description: Former The Only Way Is Essex star Lucy Mecklenburgh said she had received some shock news about her two-year-old son Roman this week
articles.content:
Lucy Mecklenburgh tried not to cry as she opened up to fans about her son Romans latest diagnosis.
